plist.dict:
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion English CFBundleDocumentTypes
@@doc_types@@
CFBundleTypeExtensions
*
CFBundleTypeName All documents CFBundleTypeOSTypes
****
CFBundleTypeRole Editor LSTypeIsPackage
CFBundleExecutable @@executable@@ CFBundleIconFile @@icns@@ CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleName @@bundle_name@@@@product_state@@ CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleIdentifier @@bundle_identifier@@@@product_state@@ CFBundleSignature ???? CFBundleGetInfoString @@bundle_name@@ @@version@@, build @@build@@. Copyright JetBrains s.r.o., (c) 2000-@@year@@ CFBundleShortVersionString @@version@@ CFBundleVersion @@build@@ LSApplicationCategoryType public.app-category.developer-tools CFBundleHelpBookName JetBrains.@@help_id@@.help CFBundleHelpBookFolder @@help_id@@.help
NSHighResolutionCapable
NSSupportsAutomaticGraphicsSwitching
@@archs@@ LSRequiresNativeExecution YES LSMinimumSystemVersion @@min_osx@@
@@url_schemes@@
JVMOptions
ClassPath @@class_path@@
JVMVersion 1.8*,1.8+
MainClass com.intellij.idea.Main Properties
@@idea_properties@@
idea.java.redist NoJavaDistribution
idea.home.path $APP_PACKAGE/Contents
VMOptions @@vmoptions@@ -XX:ErrorFile=$USER_HOME/java_error_in_@@executable@@_%p.log -XX:HeapDumpPath=$USER_HOME/java_error_in_@@executable@@.hprof -Xbootclasspath/a:../lib/boot.jar
WorkingDirectory $APP_PACKAGE/Contents/bin
